movie.title: Santa's Promise
movie.description_intro: Nick's rich Uncle makes a deathbed request: "Give away my fortune and help me save my soul." But the minute he starts, it all goes haywire. His evil twin steals his fiancé, and giving away the cash backfires. Now he's falling for his uncle's secretary. Nick's no saint, but will he keep Santa's Promise and win the girl?
movie.description_full: Nick's rich Uncle makes a deathbed request: "Give away my fortune and help me save my soul." But the minute he starts, it all goes haywire. His evil twin steals his fiancé, and giving away the cash backfires. Now he's falling for his uncle's secretary. Nick's no saint, but will he keep Santa's Promise and win the girl?

movies.title: Cagefighter
movies.summary: Reiss is the greatest champion to ever fight in a LEGENDS cage. But when promoter Max Black pits him against wrestling superstar Randy Stone, Reiss finds himself in the toughest fight of his life.
movies.description_full: Reiss is the greatest champion to ever fight in a LEGENDS cage. But when promoter Max Black pits him against wrestling superstar Randy Stone, Reiss finds himself in the toughest fight of his life.

movies.title: Return to Return to Nuke 'Em High Aka Vol. 2
movies.title_english: Return to Return to Nuke 'Em High Aka Vol. 2
movies.title_long: Return to Return to Nuke 'Em High Aka Vol. 2 (2017)
movies.summary: Return to Nuke 'Em High: Volume 2 is the continuation of Lloyd Kaufman's inspired two-part indie event film. Lauren and Chrissy, two lesbian lovers, must face and defeat the most corrupt and evil forces ever to descend upon Tromaville... and the world!
movies.description_full: Return to Nuke 'Em High: Volume 2 is the continuation of Lloyd Kaufman's inspired two-part indie event film. Lauren and Chrissy, two lesbian lovers, must face and defeat the most corrupt and evil forces ever to descend upon Tromaville... and the world!

movies.title: Koxa
movies.summary: Four Turkish friends who make their living as small time drug dealers in Stuttgart, Germany, get in over their heads when they receive a shipment of Colombian cocaine.
movies.description_full: Four Turkish friends who make their living as small time drug dealers in Stuttgart, Germany, get in over their heads when they receive a shipment of Colombian cocaine.
movies.synopsis: Four Turkish friends who make their living as small time drug dealers in Stuttgart, Germany, get in over their heads when they receive a shipment of Colombian cocaine.

movies.title: Joey
movies.summary: Billy is a boy who is trying to save a baby kangaroo called Joey after its family is captured and taken to Sydney. Billy travels to Sydney to reunite Joey with his family only to discover that Joey is not the only one who needs to be saved. Linda, the young daughter of the U.S. Ambassador joins Billy as they fight to save Joey.
